Citing anonymous sources, the Washington Post wrote that at least three federal agencies, including the Securities and Exchange Commission, Federal Bureau of Investigation and Federal Trade Commission are involved in the widening probe.

Facebook Inc. FB, -1.58% stock fell more than 1% in the extended session Monday after a report emerged of an expanding investigation into Facebook's role in the Cambridge Analytica data-sharing scandal.
Facebook stock is up 12% this year as the S&P 500 index SPX, -2.33% has gained 2%.
Facebook stock closed up 1.6% to $197.36 amid a broad rally in the tech sector.
